name: Atera Redux Journey 1: Our Lady of Chaos
name_original: Atera Redux Journey 1: Our Lady of Chaos
description:
Citizens of Arctun are mysteriously disappearing. An evil cult and internal political strife have set up shop inside the city walls, and a dark secret about the city's past threatens to reveal itself. Can you find out the truth and stop the cult before their Lady of Chaos enters our realm in this original adventure?

Classic monsters and a new BBEG team up for an enthralling story filled with political intrigue and plenty of opportunities for fighting. This full color adventure book comes with over 30 original maps detailing every area of the story, and over 50 color paintings of every NPC and monster. Enjoy the first adventure in the Atera Redux campaign setting, and be sure to check out other Atera Redux titles for expanded lore!

This adventure is compatible with the popular 5e system and the polymorph system for Mazes by 9th Level Games.
